title: L&T wins multiple orders of Rs 2500-5000 crore to build grids for clean energy transition
description: L&T's PT&D business won significant domestic and international contracts to construct substations and transmission lines. These projects are crucial for India's renewable energy zone and improving power infrastructure in Saudi Arabia and the UAE. The new orders fall in the 'Large' category, valued between Rs 2,500 to Rs 5,000 crore.
